alert.note: Alert for Carquinez Strait and Delta; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 27 at 2:20AM PDT until March 27 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 28 to 35 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Areas below 2000 feet including the Sacramento Valley, Northern San Joaquin Valley and portions of the Carquinez Strait and Delta. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 9 AM PDT Sunday and Monday mornings. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation, including early budding fruit trees, such as pears, plums and peaches, if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold temperatures Monday morning will allow for areas of frost.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Carquinez Strait and Delta; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
